page.title: 13Transport
page.content: {Colwyn Bay Expressway.} Traffic has been growing steadily over the years along the North Wales Coast. Now a new road has been built which is part of the ColCon(Colwyn Bay-Conwy) Project.This means that the mainstream traffic no longer has to go through the middle of Colwyn Bay and Mochdre. {Attitudes.} There have been many fears about the new expressway since its early planning days.Some people were against it being built at all fearing the adverse effect such a road might have on the shopping centre.However the road was built and the final stretch was opened on Saturday 29th June 1985. The people of Mochdre believe it will be a good thing on the whole as it will make the village a quieter and safer place.Village traders do not feel they will loose much trade.
